item.title: Fire cape
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Rye, post:3, topic:522827”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=641320.msg4320635#msg4320635 date=1372175715]
I’m not sure I understand either one…

if you don’t have a walking/running animation you need to add it to the itemDef

which skillcape “fails”
[/quote]If you think you helped me in something, i sewar you not. You just told me something easy. I know already what did you said, i need someone to help me![/quote]I’m still waiting on more information about the skillcape. You haven’t told me which cape emote it is. Or is it all of them? Your English is horrible.
